The claim was debunked by fact: checking experts who found no evidence to support the assertion that the NBA is asking Donald Trump to resign or threatening to never play again.
The article containing the claim was pub: NewYork One News," which is known for publishing satirical and fictional content. The website itself states that everything on it is fiction.
The source of the claim was traced back: org, which is part of a network known for creating parody and satire. The network's goal is to trick conservatives into sharing made-up content on social media.
The NBA suspended its season in mid: March due to a player testing positive for the coronavirus, not because of any political reasons or demands related to Donald Trump.
